UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Stability, Toxicity, and Biological Activity of Host Defense Peptide BMAP28 and Its Inversed and Retro-Inversed Isomers
Literature.Author: Kindrachuk J, Scruten E, Attah-Poku S, Bell K, Potter A, Babiuk LA, Griebel PJ, Napper S

Literature.Title: Effect of BMAP-28 Antimicrobial Peptides on Leishmania Major Promastigote and Amastigote Growth: Role of Leishmanolysin in Parasite Survival
Literature.Author: Lynn MA, Kindrachuk J, Marr AK, Jenssen H, Pante N, Elliott MR, Napper S, Hancock RE, McMaster WR

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Bovine erythrocytes:25% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Bovine erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=300 µg/ml,Bovine intestinal epithelial cells:50% Cell death=12 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Serratia marcescens ATCC 274(MIC=7.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=5.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=13.5µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=8.0µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis 27655R PT4(MIC=2.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=19.0µg/ml),Burkholderia cepacia ATCC 53795(MIC=5.0µg/ml),Yersinia enterocolitica O:9 E40(MIC=5.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus RN2220(MIC=10.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SA10(MIC=10.0µg/ml),Streptococcus dysgalactiae ATCC 43078(MIC=50µg/ml),Streptococcus uberis ATCC 992(MIC=33µg/ml),Leishmania major MHOM/IL/80/Friedlin(90-100% Killing=2µM)
